data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1 ~ Modified to 401 DPI
data.actual_result: The text gets cut off. How much of it cut off varies
data.expected_result: The text is exactly "Pruning will kick **amount members** who have not been seen in **amount day(s)** and are not assigned to any roles. They can re-join the server using a new Instant Invite."
data.short_description: Prune modal text gets cut off when the modal is too small
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have a low dpi device, meaning things appear small on your screen and you feel like there's alot of free space on your screen - Create/Rename/Use a server, preferably with a short name so you keep the modal small - Open Server Settings - Members - Click on the top-right menu - Prune Members - Observe
